entry.title: BCD Completion Report, Tue Mar 26 2024 18:49:11 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time) - Wed Apr 03 2024 04:41:10 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)
entry.summary: Weekly summary of things reaching complete status in BCD data
entry.content:
10 New Universal Implementations Reported!

api

  1. CSSKeyframesRule ➞ length Added to chrome Now in 3 of 3 engines
  2. Document ➞ parseHTMLUnsafe_static Added to chrome Now in 3 of 3 engines
  3. Element ➞ setHTMLUnsafe Added to chrome Now in 3 of 3 engines
  4. Permissions ➞ permission_notifications Added to safari Now in 3 of 3 engines
  5. Permissions ➞ permission_push Added to safari Now in 3 of 3 engines
  6. ShadowRoot ➞ clonable Added to chrome Now in 3 of 3 engines
  7. ShadowRoot ➞ setHTMLUnsafe Added to chrome Now in 3 of 3 engines
  8. URLSearchParams ➞ delete ➞ value_parameter Added to chrome Now in 3 of 3 engines
  9. URLSearchParams ➞ has ➞ value_parameter Added to chrome Now in 3 of 3 engines

css

  1. properties ➞ align-content ➞ block_context Added to firefox,chrome,safari Now in 3 of 3 engines
